format: html

# Loading libraries
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(car)
```

# Importing data
```{r}
data <- read_xlsx("Data/params.xlsx")
```
# EDA
```{r}
summary(data)
glimpse(data)
```

```{r}
data_w <- data |> 
  mutate(treatment = as.factor(treatment))
```

```{r}
data_w |> 
  ggplot(aes(treatment,thetas, color = treatment))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter()+
  labs(y = "Porosity", 
       title = "Porosity across treatments")+
  theme_classic()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
  
```

```{r}
options(contrasts = c("contr.sum", "contr.poly"))

mod <- lm(thetas ~ treatment, data = data_w)
summary(mod)
Anova(mod, type = 3)
```
